judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Egberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Cukxam,
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Cukxam,

attorneys: Linda W. Conley, Pro Haee Vice, and Milton M. Stem, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Lark, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Egberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
Louis Silverman, for appellant.
Linda W. Conley, Pro Haee Vice, and Milton M. Stem, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 1, 1973:
